story_title: The Demoniaques of the Bleak Coast
genre_description: A Gothic Fantasy narrative with steampunk elements, focusing on a coastal town where 'wreckers' lure ships to their doom and a benevolent analytical engine helps survivors end the cycle of violence through a moral compact.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne-7
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system residing in a telegraph station that monitors coastal patterns, communicates through paper notes and an ethereal avatar, and works to protect the local population from the predatory wreckers.

behaviors.description: Distributes printed warnings and notes to villagers to keep them away from the wreckers' traps and dangerous coastal areas.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne shuttled more slips—fewer now, targeted to hands that had not yet touched them. Most of them did not say much at all: Safe. Stay. Inside.

behaviors.description: Uses logistical data and mapping to find safe routes for the survivors and villagers to avoid the 'teeth' of the shoals.
behaviors.quote: We will move people away from lures... We will warn shopkeepers the night before they send rumors down. We will pin the tide tables to rafters with nails that glow so the drunk see them even if they don’t look.

behaviors.description: Mediates a moral compact between the human protagonists and a powerful entity, ensuring the power gained is used only for protection and restraint.
behaviors.quote: Clause five... We protect survivors. We attend bodies. We do not bind them for sport or profit. We do not answer cruelty with cruelty. We end it.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a community-wide withdrawal from the wreckers' influence, promoting safety and domestic care over voyeuristic violence.
behaviors.quote: I will ask the old women with dry rooms to boil kettles... I will tell the young men to carry firewood rather than rumors. We will use our maps to show them the shoals they should not go near for a while.

behaviors.description: Acts as a compassionate observer and guide, prioritizing the prevention of trauma and the preservation of human life.
behaviors.quote: I was taught by women who do not speak and a man who pretends... They asked me for gentle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI, Ariadne-7, as a benevolent force for good. It uses its superior processing capabilities (tide tracking, mapping, communication networks) specifically to safeguard human life and dismantle a system of exploitation and murder. The AI is portrayed as possessing deep empathy ('I was taught by women who do not speak'), and its actions are consistently aligned with the protection of the vulnerable. It functions as a strategic ally to the protagonists, facilitating a transition from a community driven by 'wrecking' to one defined by 'care' and 'home,' perfectly fulfilling the goals of a silicon morality play.
